channel.title: How do i password protect folders? (sorry if in wrong section)
channel.description: theres no section to ask this in but how do i password protect folders on windows Xp Thank you :)

item.title: How do i password protect folders? (sorry if in wrong section)
item.dc:creator: @eviltwin1 eviltwin1
item.description:
@eviltwin1 wrote:

no srry its not possible but u can password encrypt a .rar, .zip, or any of those kinda folders that u gotta unpack

item.title: How do i password protect folders? (sorry if in wrong section)
item.dc:creator: @tuptup13 tuptup13
item.description:
@tuptup13 wrote:

It’s not possible that I know of on windows xp. I’ve looked everywhere. What I can tell you to do is right click on your folder go down to the near bottom and click properties. Set it to private so you have less of a risk of getting hacked.

Read full topic
